body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Run magarena on a relatively resolution (below 1366x768 for example) What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The normal magarena screen with a scrollbar to allow access to non-visibly areas. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.24 / Ubuntu 11.10

I fount the problem trying to create a custom deck. The buttons for the task
are not visible due to screen size issues. The attached screenshow will give you
a better idea of what i am talking about.

Sorry about the resolution problem, the same bug was reported on the forum earlier and we did a quick patch by adding a scroll bar. You can replace your current Magarena.exe with https://magarena.ci.cloudbees.com/job/Magarena-Daily/31/artifact/release/Magarena.exe

**Status:** Accepted
